reviews.name: LG 30" Freestanding Electric Range LRE3085ST
reviews.reviewText: The controls for the cooktop offer a large range of options. The two front burners offer a small and large radius which is very handy. The oven works perfectly.
reviews.title: Very nice looking oven with great features

reviews.name: LG 30" Freestanding Electric Range LRE3085ST
reviews.reviewText:
I'm absolutely happy with this stove. I've had it now for about 2 months and so far, so good. The glass top is a bit tricky to keep looking perfect but not impossible!

The installer gave me a hint on the stainless finish. He recommended baby oil on a soft cloth and to go with the grain of the steel. It works perfectly once you get the technique down!

Overall, very happy with the features and appearance!
reviews.title: Love this classy looking stove

reviews.name: LG 30" Freestanding Electric Range LRE3085ST
reviews.reviewText: I love this range! It has so many great features, some I have not had time to use. The control panel is easy to use and understand. The smooth cook top is easy to clean and is smart looking! I wanted a double oven but decided to buy this range because of the size of the oven, it is huge! Bought a Convection Microwave by LG and the two work and look beautiful together.
reviews.title: Great features, and looks amazing!

reviews.name: LG 30" Freestanding Electric Range LRE3085ST
reviews.reviewText: I am very pleased with the performance of my stove. I wish the timer was louder and cooktop a little easier to keep clean. I love the fast cooking!
reviews.title: Great features and cooks fast.

reviews.name: LG 30" Freestanding Electric Range LRE3085ST
reviews.reviewText: I bought this Range because I liked it's modern look and because of its features (i.e. convection, glass range and the digital interface.
reviews.title: Quality is Good
